name: Chronomon - Demo Coming Soon
description:
Chronomon is currently in Development and in Pre-Registration on Kickstarter

Will be available on PC / Mobile / Smartwatches (Steam, Android, WearOS)

Kickstarter Pre-Registration Home Page

Chronomon is a monster taming JRPG game with retro pixel art graphics. Raise your Chronomons from an egg, capture them, battle other trainers in this one of a kind, WearOS Smartwatch monster taming game. 

Features:

- Engaging multi branched storyline. Relive the same 3 days over until you find a way to stop loop. Choose to help one person, lose out on another quest. The choice is yours.

- Tame and Capture as many monsters as you can. Over 50+ monsters

- Train them and choose their skills from over 20+ different skill tree combinations. 

- Bring a team of 6 with you and battle other trainers

- Challenging puzzles to solve using your monsters abilities

- Epic boss battles and trainer arenas.

- Unlock the mysteries the kingdom and gather information about all of the monsters
